sentences.sContent: For music and clothing i have special percipient.
sentences.sContent_eng: For music and clothing i have special percipient.
sentences.sCn: 我对音乐和服装都有独特的鉴赏力。

sentences.sContent: Its theme decorates the expression of the hobby that is domestic host and appeal, it has very big effect to the promotion of interior edify and percipient .
sentences.sContent_eng: Its theme decorates the expression of the hobby that is domestic host and appeal, it has very big effect to the promotion of interior edify and percipient .
sentences.sCn: 其主题装饰就是家庭主人的爱好和情趣的表现，它对心灵陶冶和鉴赏力的提升有很大作用。

remMethod.val: per + cip (拿住) + ient → 拿住了要点 → 有觉察力的
